snippet: Total immersion and communality were the norm at this free festival at a unique desert setting in Arizona, with Skrillex and Four Tet headlining.
abstract: Jon Caramanica Critic's Notebook reflects on unhurried pace and communal spirit at third annual FORM Arcosanti music festival, organized by Florida band Hundred Waters, in Arizona.
lead_paragraph: Total immersion and communality were the norm at this free festival at a unique desert setting in Arizona, with Skrillex and Four Tet headlining.

headline.print_headline: A Music Festival That Thinks Small
headline.main: FORM Arcosanti, a Music Festival That Thinks Small
